subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The top three golfers in the world — Tiger Woods, Rory McIlroy and Adam Scott — will be in the same group in the first two rounds of the U.S. Open.
snippet: The top three golfers in the world — Tiger Woods, Rory McIlroy and Adam Scott — will be in the same group in the first two rounds of the U.S. Open.
